title: (x) Jif peanut butter logo - hand drawn {Florian}
content:
Hey all!

This is a favor for a cousin: does anyone know what font is used for the logo of Jif peanut butter?

Thank you!

Alec
author: letsjumpnow

comments.content:
I guess you’re referring to [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20141009103112/http:/www.jif.com/products/details.asp?prodID=325) and not to [that](http://web.archive.org/web/20141009103112/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/60585948@N00/251255904/) …  
No font, it’s a (custom drawn) logo. A starting point: [Mobley Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20141009103112/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/mobley/sans/).  
F

The beauty and simplicity of the Jif logo is that the J and f are so very close in form.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141009103112im_/http:/typophile.com/files/jif_logo_5658.gif)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141009103112im_/http:/typophile.com/files/jif_logo_upsidedown_5555.gif)
